title: Can't export the NFS volumes
content:
When you export NFS volumes to the NFS server, you receive an error message that resembles the following:

No options for /var/vols/itom/core *: suggest *(sync) to avoid warning

Cause

This issue occurs because the syntax of the /etc/exports file is wrong. For example, there is a space between * and  (.

Solution

Use the correct syntax in the the /etc/exports file to export NFS volumes. For example:

/var/vols/itom/core <IP list>(rw,sync,anonuid=1999,anongid=1999,root_squash)


Set uid and gid to the values that you defined for the SYSTEM_USER_ID and SYSTEM_GROUP_ID parameters in the install.properties file. In this example, the values are 1999.
